sentences.sContent: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.sContent_eng: As one local resident put it in May, "By day there is government.
sentences.sCn: 正如一位当地居民在五月份对它的描述”白天有政府。

sentences.sContent: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.sContent_eng: A resident said, "I think we should write it down on paper or tell our family members.
sentences.sCn: 一位居民说：“我觉得我们应该把遗嘱写在纸上或者告诉给自己的家人。

sentences.sContent: Few of her former comrades enjoy this comfort; but, as another resident explained, the authorities like them to live there "to do propaganda and education work".
sentences.sContent_eng: Few of her former comrades enjoy this comfort; but, as another resident explained, the authorities like them to live there "to do propaganda and education work".
sentences.sCn: 她以前的同志，很少人能享受能这种舒适生活；不过另一个居民解释说，当局希望他们住在那以“进行宣传教育工作”。

synos.tran: 居住的；住院医师；定居的

phrases.pCn: 生化危机（原为日本恐怖游戏，后改编为电影）

remMethod.val: 来自reside(vi. 居住于， 定居于)
